meanings.sent1: The robotic arm in the factory helped assemble cars efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The new vacuum cleaner had a robotic feature that allowed it to clean on its own.
meanings.sent3: The robotic waiter at the restaurant kept serving dishes without a break.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were so precise and robotic, it was as if she was programmed for perfection.
meanings.sent5: The robotic voice on the phone menu guided customers through the options smoothly.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a robot.
meanings.sent1: His stiff and robotic movements on stage made him look like a mechanical toy.
meanings.sent2: The way she spoke in a monotone voice sounded robotic and unnatural.
meanings.sent3: The robotic dance moves at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were empty, except for the robotic figures moving in unison.
meanings.sent5: The robotic walk of the security guard made him seem unapproachable.

meanings.sent1: Her response to the sad news was robotic, lacking any empathy.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, his robotic face revealed nothing about his thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The robotic delivery of the joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: His apology seemed robotic, as if he didn't truly mean it.
meanings.sent5: The robotic smile on her face didn't reach her eyes, showing her true feelings.
